name: amqp-rpc-factory
description: Nodejs AMQP RPC Consumer and Publisher Factory

scripts.test: echo "Run 'gulp help' for task list" && exit 0
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -x '*.spec.js' --root lib/ --dir test/coverage  -- 'test/*.spec.js'  && cat ./test/coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
